## EditorPluginProps.autofocusRef property

Ref to use for an input element. The element will receive focus, when the plugin is focused.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
autofocusRef: React.RefObject<HTMLInputElement & HTMLTextAreaElement>;
```
